verses.roman:
yei pathe pūrve prabhu kailā āgamana
sei pathe calilā dekhi, sarva vaiṣṇava-gaṇa

synonyms: yei pathe—the path by which; pūrve—formerly; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kailā āgamana—came; sei pathe—by that way; calilā—departed; dekhi—seeing; sarva—all; vaiṣṇava-gaṇa—Vaiṣṇavas.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu returned by the same road He formerly took to Vidyānagara, and all the Vaiṣṇavas along the way saw Him again.
